explanations.recommendation: Restrict inbound SSH to trusted IP addresses
explanations.justification: This control violates ISO 27001 A.9.1 (access restrictions).

explanations.description: S3 bucket has public read access enabled
explanations.recommendation: Remove public access and implement proper IAM policies
explanations.justification: Violates ISO 27001 A.13.1 (information security in networks).

explanations.description: RDS instance lacks encryption at rest
explanations.recommendation: Enable encryption for all database instances
explanations.justification: HIPAA requires encryption of PHI at rest (164.312(a)(2)(iv)).

recommendations.title: Restrict SSH Access
recommendations.description: Update security group sg-0a1b2c3d to allow SSH only from trusted IP ranges
recommendations.impact: Reduces exposure to brute-force attacks and unauthorized access

recommendations.title: Secure S3 Bucket
recommendations.description: Remove public read access from S3 bucket and implement least-privilege IAM policies
recommendations.impact: Prevents data breaches and unauthorized data access

recommendations.title: Enable Database Encryption
recommendations.description: Enable encryption at rest for RDS instances containing sensitive data
recommendations.impact: Ensures compliance with HIPAA encryption requirements
